TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingProfileSerializer extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 提供將追蹤設定檔序列化為 XML 文件，以及從 XML 文件將追蹤設定檔還原序列化的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to serialize and deserialize tracking profiles into and from XML documents by using the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用包含在 中的追蹤設定檔 XSD 將 物件序列化為有效的 XML 文件，以及將有效的 XML 文件還原序列化為 物件。The uses the tracking profile XSD contained in to serialize objects into valid XML documents and to deserialize valid XML documents into objects. 會在序列化和還原序列化期間執行驗證，並視需要擲回適當的例外狀況。The performs validation during both serialization and deserialization and, if necessary, throws an appropriate exception. XML 文件提供儲存追蹤設定檔的方便格式。An XML document provides a convenient format in which to store a tracking profile. 它也提供撰寫追蹤設定檔的非程式設計方法。It also provides a non-programmatic way of authoring tracking profiles. 全新的 會使用 來序列化和還原序列化儲存在其資料庫中的追蹤設定檔。The out-of-box uses a to serialize and deserialize the tracking profiles that are stored in its database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 以序列化 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor to serialize a . 此程式碼也會使用 方法。The code also uses the method. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 以序列化 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor to serialize a . 此程式碼也會使用 方法。The code also uses the method. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile Deserialize(class System.IO.TextReader reader) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (reader As TextReader) As TrackingProfile

span.span: A that contains an XML document.

summary.span: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 還原序列化包含在文字閱讀器中的 XML 文件。

span.span: Deserializes the XML document that is contained in the text reader by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).

returns.span: 包含還原序列化的追蹤設定檔的 。

span.span: A that contains the deserialized tracking profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 還原序列化指的是從格式正確的 XML 文件建立物件的程序。Deserialization refers to the process of creating an object from a well-formed XML document. 會使用包含在 中的追蹤設定檔 XSD，將包含在文字讀取器中的 XML 文件還原序列化為有效的 。 uses the tracking profile XSD contained in to deserialize the XML document that is contained in the text reader into a valid . 還原序列化期間會在 XML 文件上執行驗證，如果文件無效，則擲回 。Validation on the XML document is performed during deserialization, and, if the document is not valid, a is thrown. 您可以捕捉此例外狀況，並檢查 以判斷驗證錯誤的原因。You can catch this exception and examine to determine the cause of the validation error. 如果在還原序列化追蹤設定檔的期間有任何未處理的例外狀況，將終止要求追蹤設定檔的工作流程執行個體。If there are any unhandled exceptions while deserializing the tracking profile then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested will be terminated. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要執行驗證，但不還原序列化追蹤設定檔的 XML 表示法，您可以寫入您自己的追蹤設定檔驗證程式。If you want to perform validation without deserializing the XML representation of a tracking profile, you can write your own tracking profile validator. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。See the property for more information.

exception.span: 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 不包含符合追蹤設定檔 XSD 的文件。

span.span: does not contain a document that conforms to the tracking profile XSD.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As XmlSchema
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ Schema { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD)。

span.span: Gets the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會公開 用於執行 的序列化和還原序列化的追蹤設定檔 XSD。This property exposes the tracking profile XSD used by the to perform serialization and deserialization of a . 您也可使用此屬性取得追蹤設定檔 XSD 以寫入您自己用於追蹤設定檔的驗證程式。You may also use this property to get the tracking profile XSD in order to write your own validator for tracking profiles. 例如，您可能想要執行此動作以驗證追蹤設定檔的 XML 表示法，而且不執行還原序列化。For example, you may want to do this in order to validate XML representations of tracking profiles without performing deserialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.TextWriter writer, class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile profile) cil managed
Public Sub Serialize (writer As TextWriter, profile As TrackingProfile)

param.name: profile
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含存有 XML 文件的 。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a that holds the XML document.

param.span: 參數是以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 將追蹤設定檔序列化為 XML 文件。

span.span: Serializes the tracking profile into an XML document by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化是指從有效的 建立格式正確的 XML 文件的程序。Serialization refers to the process of creating a well-formed XML document from a valid . 會使用追蹤設定檔 ，將追蹤設定檔序列化。 uses the tracking profile to serialize the tracking profile. `profile` 必須是有效的 ，包含至少一個有效的追蹤點。`profile` must be a valid that contains at least one valid track point. 序列化期間會在追蹤設定檔上執行驗證，如果追蹤設定檔無效，則擲回 。Validation on the tracking profile is performed during serialization, and, if the tracking profile is not valid, an is thrown. 您可以捕捉此例外狀況，並檢查它的訊息屬性以判斷驗證錯誤的原因。You can catch this exception and examine its message property to determine the cause of the validation error. 如果在序列化追蹤設定檔的期間有任何未處理的例外狀況，將終止要求追蹤設定檔的工作流程執行個體。If there are any unhandled exceptions while serializing the tracking profile, then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested is terminated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 以序列化 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor to serialize a . 此程式碼也會使用 方法。The code also uses the method. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21).
